EmailTemplate.subject: You’re invited to an exclusive CEO Roundtable with Rob Mee of Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Rob Mee is the CEO of one of the hottest software startups <[[https://techcrunch.com/2016/05/05/pivotal-lands-253-million-series-c-led-by-ford-and-microsoft-on-2-8-billion-valuation/]]>, as well as one of the most influential people in Silicon Valley <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/the-silicon-valley-100-ranked-1-to-100-2016-6]]> (ranked #30).
Today, Pivotal works with a third of Fortune 100 Companies, including industry leaders such as GE, Ford, Verizon, Home Depot, Comcast, Humana, Lockheed Martin, Liberty Mutual, and Allstate. Now, Pivotal is bringing Silicon Valley to Atlanta.
Please join us for an exclusive, invitation-only discussion with Rob Mee on how the world’s most admired brands are using technology to level the playing field and lets them build software their customers love. Learn from the company behind Uber, Twitter, Square, Airbnb, Tesla, Google, and many of the top disruptors in the world. The roundtable will be followed by an evening of networking with Atlanta’s most prominent CEOs and CIOs.
Space is limited so register today to meet industry leaders from iconic organizations based in Atlanta, local political leaders, Pivotal executives, and much more.
What: Private CEO Roundtable with one of the most influential people in Silicon Valley—Rob Mee, CEO of Pivotal
When:
Tuesday, March 21, 2017 5:00PM to 6:00PM
Where: Pivotal Atlanta Office 675 Ponce de Leon Ave NE, Suite 7500 Atlanta, GA 30308 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ponce+City+Market,+675+Ponce+De+Leon+Ave+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f50410912c7be9:0x275114353ab5ce34?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjihMixwoPSAhWowlQKHY0MCAMQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
